kulli.content:
-------------------------------------------------------------

![Kulli home page](/photoasset/kulli0.png)


Kulli is a **modern logistics and trucking service application** designed to seamlessly connect **clients** with **truck owners**.
Whether itâ€™s **household moves, shipments, or fleet management**, Kulli makes booking, tracking, and managing logistics easy and efficient.

---

## âœ¨ Key Features

- ğŸ” **User Registration & Authentication** (Clients & Truck Owners)
- ğŸš› **Truck Booking System** (Search, Select, Confirm)
- ğŸ—ºï¸ **Live Shipment Tracking** with interactive maps
- ğŸ“¦ **Fleet Management** tools for truck owners
- ğŸ’³ **Secure Payment System** + Invoice generation
- ğŸ”” **Real-time Notifications** for updates
- ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Admin Dashboard** for managing users & trips

---

## ğŸ›  Tech Stack

- **Frontend:** âš›ï¸ React.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript
- **Backend:** ğŸ Python (Flask/Django)
- **Database:** ğŸ—„ï¸ SQLite / PostgreSQL
- **Hosting:** â˜ï¸ AWS / GCP

---

## ğŸ“Œ Getting Started

### âœ… Prerequisites

Make sure you have the following installed:

- ğŸ Python 3.x
- ğŸŸ¢ Node.js & npm
- ğŸ—„ï¸ SQLite / PostgreSQL
- ğŸ”— Git

---

### ğŸ”§ Installation

1ï¸âƒ£ **Clone the Repository**

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/kulli.git
cd kulli
```

2ï¸âƒ£ **Set Up Backend**

```bash
cd backend
pip install -r requirements.txt
python manage.py migrate
python manage.py runserver
```

3ï¸âƒ£ **Set Up Frontend**

```bash
cd frontend
npm install
npm start
```

---

## ğŸš€ How to Use

### ğŸ‘¤ Step 1: Sign Up & Log In

Create an account as **Client** or **Truck Owner**.

### ğŸ“¦ Step 2: Book a Truck (Client)

- Enter pickup & drop-off details
- Select truck type
- Confirm booking

### ğŸš› Step 3: Accept Request (Truck Owner)

- View new trip requests
- Accept jobs instantly

### ğŸ—ºï¸ Step 4: Track Shipment

- Monitor live truck movement on the interactive map

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

We welcome contributions! ğŸ’¡

1. ğŸ´ Fork the repository
2. ğŸŒ± Create a feature branch:

   ```bash
   git checkout -b feature-name
   ```

3. ğŸ’¾ Commit changes:

   ```bash
   git commit -m "Add new feature"
   ```

4. ğŸš€ Push to branch:

   ```bash
   git push origin feature-name
   ```

5. ğŸ”„ Submit a Pull Request

ğŸ“© For collaboration or feature ideas, reach out at: **[teklebrhandawit309@gmail.com](mailto:teklebrhandawit309@gmail.com)**

---

## ğŸ“§ Contact

For questions, suggestions, or feedback:
ğŸ“© Email: **[teklebrhandawit309@gmail.com](mailto:teklebrhandawit309@gmail.com)**

---

âœ¨ Built with passion to move things forward. ğŸššğŸ’¨

project2.content:
-------------------------------------------------

![home page](/photoasset/event1.png)

A web platform that connects individuals and organizations with venue owners for all types of events. Whether you're planning a wedding, corporate event, or concert, **Venue Link** helps you find and book the perfect venue â€” quickly and effortlessly.

## ğŸ“ Description

**Venue Link** bridges the gap between event organizers and venue owners. Users can easily browse, find, and book venues for:

- ğŸ’ Weddings
- ğŸ¢ Corporate Events
- ğŸ›ï¸ Trade Shows
- ğŸš€ Product Launches
- ğŸ“ Graduations
- ğŸ¶ Concerts
- ğŸ‰ Private Parties
- ğŸ¤ Conferences
- ğŸ“š Seminars
- ğŸ› ï¸ Workshops

Venue owners can register and manage their listings, making their venues visible and bookable to a broad audience. This system reduces the time and stress involved in finding and securing event spaces.

---

## ğŸ§° Tech Stack

---

## âš™ï¸ Installation

To run the Event-Booking project locally, follow the steps below. We recommend using **XAMPP** as your local development environment.

### âœ… Prerequisites

- [XAMPP](https://www.apachefriends.org/) (includes PHP, MySQL, and Apache)

### ğŸš€ Steps

1ï¸âƒ£ **Download or Clone the Repository**

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Dawittekle/event-booking.git
```

2ï¸âƒ£ **Move the Project to XAMPP**
Copy the project folder (`event-booking`) into your XAMPP `htdocs` directory:

```
C:\xampp\htdocs\
```

3ï¸âƒ£ **Start XAMPP Services**

- Start **Apache** and **MySQL** from the XAMPP Control Panel

4ï¸âƒ£ **Set Up the Database**

- Go to [http://localhost/phpmyadmin](http://localhost/phpmyadmin)
- Click on **Import** â†’ Select `event_booking.sql` (from the project folder)
- Click **Go** to create the database schema and tables

5ï¸âƒ£ **Configure Database Connection**
Edit `config.php` or `db.php`:

```php
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "root";
$password = "";
$dbname = "event_booking"; // Match the imported DB name
```

6ï¸âƒ£ **Run the Application**
Open in browser:

```
http://localhost/event-booking
```

---

## ğŸ“¸ Screenshots

- ğŸ  Homepage

[XAMPP](https://www.apachefriends.org/)

- ğŸ“‹ Venue Listings

- ğŸ“ Booking Form

- ğŸ“Š Dashboard

- ğŸ§¾ Register Form

---

## ğŸ“Œ Usage Notes

- ğŸ“‚ Use the provided SQL file to initialize the database
- ğŸ‘¤ Users must **register** and **log in** to book venues
- ğŸ¢ Venue owners must **register their venue** through the portal

---

## ğŸ‘¥ Author

**Dawit Teklebrhan**
GitHub: [@Dawittekle](https://github.com/Dawittekle)

Special thanks to the team members who contributed to the development of this project.

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change or improve.
project2.description: A web platform that connects individuals and organizations with venue owners for all types of events.
project2.title: ğŸ‰ Event-Booking (Venue Link)

project3.content:
----------------------------------------------------------

**PlayJS** is a web platform that brings together a variety of fun, engaging, and lightweight JavaScript games. Built from scratch with vanilla JavaScript, these games are designed to be simple yet entertaining, accessible right in your browser.

---

## ğŸ“ Description

PlayJS is my personal gaming hub where I showcase the collection of mini-games Iâ€™ve built over time while learning and experimenting with JavaScript. From classic arcade-style games to puzzle challenges, PlayJS demonstrates creativity and problem-solving through code.

Some of the featured games include:

- ğŸ **Snake Game** â€“ A classic snake game built with the Canvas API.
- ğŸ§© **Tic-Tac-Toe** â€“ Simple 2-player logic game.
- ğŸƒ **Dino Run Clone** â€“ A Chrome dino game replica.
- ğŸ² **Guess the Number** â€“ Fun number guessing logic.
- ğŸ§± **Brick Breaker** â€“ A breakout-style game using collision detection.
- â±ï¸ **Memory Match** â€“ A card matching puzzle game.

All games are playable directly on the web platform.

---

## ğŸ§° Tech Stack

- **HTML5** â€“ Game structure & layout
- **CSS3** â€“ Styling & animations
- **JavaScript (ES6)** â€“ Game logic & interactivity
- **Canvas API** â€“ Rendering 2D game graphics
- **Node.js** â€“ Backend setup (optional for serving platform)

---

## âš™ï¸ Installation

### âœ… Prerequisites

- Web browser (Chrome, Firefox, or Edge)
- Node.js (optional if serving with backend)

### ğŸš€ Steps

1ï¸âƒ£ Clone the repository:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Dawittekle/playjs.git
```

2ï¸âƒ£ Open the project folder:

```bash
cd playjs
```

3ï¸âƒ£ Open `index.html` in your browser to play the games.

(Optional)
If you want to run it with Node.js:

```bash
npm install
npm start
```

Then open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)

---

## ğŸ“¸ Screenshots

- ğŸ Snake Game
- ğŸ§© Tic-Tac-Toe
- ğŸƒ Dino Run Clone
- ğŸ² Guess the Number
- ğŸ§± Brick Breaker
- â±ï¸ Memory Match

---

## ğŸ“Œ Usage Notes

- Play directly in your browser.
- Works on both desktop and mobile (responsive design).
- Great for quick fun & coding demos.

---

## ğŸ‘¥ Author

**Dawit Teklebrhan**
GitHub: [@Dawittekle](https://github.com/Dawittekle)

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Feel free to suggest new game ideas or improvements via pull requests or issues.
project3.description: A web platform showcasing a collection of fun and interactive JavaScript games developed by me.
project3.title: ğŸ® PlayJS â€“ JavaScript Games Hub

project4.content:
------------------------------------------------------

![logo](/photoasset/tserepng.png)

A powerful **Telegram bot** that detects and removes hate speech in group chats using **NLP**. It warns users, notifies admins, and automatically removes repeat offenders.

ğŸ‘‰ Try it here: [@tserealutawi\_bot](https://t.me/tserealutawi_bot)

---

## âœ¨ Features

- âœ… **Auto-Delete Hate Speech** â€“ Instantly removes offensive messages
- âœ… **User Warning System** â€“ Issues up to 5 warnings before removal
- âœ… **Auto-Kick Offenders** â€“ Users with 5 warnings are removed
- âœ… **Admin Notifications** â€“ Alerts admins about violations
- âœ… **Admin Management** â€“ Add or remove admins easily

---

## ğŸ§° Tech Stack

- ğŸ Python
- ğŸ¤– Telegram Bot API (`python-telegram-bot`)
- ğŸ§  NLP Model (Hate Speech Detection)
- âš™ï¸ `python-dotenv` for environment variables

---

## âš™ï¸ Installation

### âœ… Prerequisites

- Python 3.8+
- A **Telegram Bot Token** (from [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather))

### ğŸš€ Steps

1ï¸âƒ£ **Clone the Repository**

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/hate-speech-monitor-bot.git
cd hate-speech-monitor-bot
```

2ï¸âƒ£ **Install Dependencies**

```bash
pip install -r requirements.txt
```

3ï¸âƒ£ **Create `.env` File**

```env
BOT_TOKEN=your-telegram-bot-token
```

4ï¸âƒ£ **Run the Bot**

```bash
python bot.py
```

---

## ğŸ“Œ Commands

**User Commands**

- `/help` â€“ Show available commands
- `/id` â€“ Get your Telegram user ID

**Admin Commands**

- `/addadmin <user_id>` â€“ Add an admin
- `/removeadmin <user_id>` â€“ Remove an admin
- `/listadmins` â€“ List all admins
- `/unban <user_id>` â€“ Unban a user and reset warnings

---

## ğŸ¤– How It Works

1. The bot **monitors messages** in your group
2. If a message contains **hate speech**, it is **deleted**
3. The user receives a **warning** privately
4. After **5 warnings**, the user is **removed** from the group
5. **Admins are notified** about violations

---

## âš ï¸ Notes

- The bot must have **Admin permissions** in your Telegram group
- Admins can manage the bot with the provided commands

---

## ğŸ‘¥ Author

**Dawit Teklebrhan**
GitHub: [@Dawittekle](https://github.com/Dawittekle)

---

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Want to add **multi-language support** or new features? Open a pull request or contact me!

---

ğŸ”¥ Developed with â¤ï¸ to keep communities safe!
